DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors Co-existence Cervical Elongation Uterine Prolapse
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : Thus aim study investigate risk factor co-existence cervical elongation uterine prolapse . Patients Methods : Between January 1994 October 2014 , woman undergo vaginal total hysterectomy medical center enrol study . Medical record review . Cervical elongation define presence cervical length > 3.38 cm cervix corpus ratio > 0.79 . Expected Results : The investigator get risk factor co-existence cervical elongation uterine prolapse , result helpful preoperative consultation , especially uterine-preserving pelvic floor reconstruction surgery .
DOC.criteria: All woman uterine prolapse underwent vaginal total hysterectomy > 20 year old .
